name: International Whisky Competition
notes: Annual international whisky competition. Publishes detailed scores (out of 100) and category winners. Whisky of the Year, Distillery of the Year, Master Distiller awards.

name: World Whiskies Awards
notes: Part of World Drinks Awards. Global competition with category winners by region and style. Best Single Malt, Best Blended, Icons of Whisky. Annual ceremony in London.

name: International Wine & Spirit Competition (IWSC)
notes: Premier global competition. Gold Outstanding (98-100), Gold, Silver, Bronze medals. Covers whiskey, port wine, and all spirits. North American Whiskey & RTD competition held in Bardstown, KY.

name: San Francisco World Spirits Competition
notes: Largest and most influential spirits competition. Double Gold, Gold, Silver, Bronze medals. Best of Class awards. Results via The Tasting Alliance. Record 5,500+ entries in 2025.

name: International Spirits Challenge (ISC)
notes: Longest-running spirits competition (31 years). Supreme Champion Spirit title. Double Gold, Gold, Silver, Bronze medals. 70+ countries participate. Organized by Drinks International.

name: Decanter World Wine Awards
notes: World's largest wine competition (23 years). Best in Show, Platinum (97+), Gold, Silver, Bronze medals. 248 expert judges including 72 Masters of Wine. Strong port wine coverage.

name: International Wine Challenge (IWC)
notes: Major wine competition since 1984. Gold, Silver, Bronze, Commended awards. 500+ expert judges from 38 countries. Port Trophy category.

name: Scottish Whisky Awards
notes: Annual Scottish-focused competition since 2019. Blind-tasted whisky awards plus business excellence categories (tourism, marketing, innovation). Held in Glasgow.

name: Online Scotch Whisky Awards (OSWA)
notes: Community-driven awards. No paid entries - chosen by community. Annual ceremony on YouTube. Celebrates whiskies, distilleries, and bottlers.

name: Irish Whiskey Awards
notes: Annual awards since 2013. Blind-tasted by whiskey societies. Categories: single malt, single pot still, blended, grain, cask strength. Organized by Celtic Whiskey Shop.

name: The Irish Whiskey Masters
notes: Part of The Spirits Business Global Spirits Masters. Taste Master award for top expression. Master, Gold, Silver, Bronze medals.

name: North American Bourbon & Whiskey Competition
notes: Annual competition now in 11th year. Best of Show, Best of Class, Double Gold (95+), Gold medals. Focus on American whiskey and bourbon.

name: ADI International Spirits Competition
notes: American Distilling Institute competition. Best of Class awards by category. Focus on craft distillers. Annual event.

name: New York International Spirits Competition
notes: Trade buyer focused competition. Best in Class by category. Part of The Tasting Alliance. Distillery of the Year award.

name: London Spirits Competition
notes: Rates spirits by quality, value, and packaging. Spirit of the Year award. Trade-focused judging panel.

name: The Scotch Whisky Masters
notes: Part of The Spirits Business Global Spirits Masters. Taste Master for top expression. Master, Gold, Silver, Bronze medals. Blind tasting by expert panels.

name: The American Whiskey Masters
notes: Part of The Spirits Business Global Spirits Masters. Covers bourbon, rye, American single malt. Taste Master award for top expression.

name: The World Whisky Masters
notes: Part of The Spirits Business Global Spirits Masters. Covers non-Scotch, non-American whiskies (Japanese, Taiwanese, Australian, etc.).

name: Whisky Magazine
notes: Publisher of World Whiskies Awards. Hall of Fame inductees. Icons of Whisky awards for industry figures.

name: The Whiskey Wash
notes: Whiskey publication that tracks competition results. Best Whiskies annual list. Competition result aggregator.

name: Wines of Portugal Challenge
notes: Portuguese wine competition. Grand Gold, Gold, Silver medals. Best Fortified Wine of the Year. Douro/Porto region leads in awards.

name: Wine Enthusiast
notes: Wine Star Awards. 2025 International Wine Region of the Year: Douro Valley. The Enthusiast 100 annual list. Port wine ratings section.

name: Wine Spectator
notes: Top 100 Wines annual list. Expert ratings 50-100 scale. Vintage Port chart. Port wine coverage including vintage and tawny.

name: Wine Searcher
notes: Wine database and price aggregator. Best Ports annual list. Critic score aggregation. Competition results tracking.

name: Club Oenologique
notes: Wine publication with port wine reviews. Best Port annual guides. Award-winning port recommendations.

name: World Drinks Awards
notes: Parent organization of World Whiskies Awards. Also covers Icons of Whisky. News and results from multiple drink categories.
